# AVCaptionRubyAlignment

**Enumeration**

Constants that indicate ruby text alignments.

## Declaration

```swift
enum AVCaptionRubyAlignment
```

## Text alignments

- **AVCaptionRubyAlignment.start**: An alignment with the ruby base and text at the left edge of horizontal text in a left-to-right inline progression, or at top of the vertical text in a top-to-bottom inline progression.
- **AVCaptionRubyAlignment.center**: An alignment with the ruby text at the center of ruby base.
- **AVCaptionRubyAlignment.distributeSpaceBetween**: An alignment with the ruby text so the spaces between the ruby text characters are equal.
- **AVCaptionRubyAlignment.distributeSpaceAround**: An alignment with the ruby text so the spaces around each ruby text character are equal.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Accessing text properties

- **text**: The ruby text.
- **position**: The ruby text position.
- **AVCaptionRubyPosition**: Constants that indicate ruby text positions.
- **alignment**: The ruby text alignment.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
